name: @decibel/tools
description: MCP server for project intelligence. 26 facade tools (170+ internal handlers) across 20 domains: work tracking, architecture, experiments, design, git forensics, agent coordination, and more.
author: Decibel Systems

privacy_policies.name: Local Storage Only
privacy_policies.description: All project data is stored locally in .decibel/ folders within your project directories. No data is sent to external servers by default.

privacy_policies.name: Optional Cloud Integrations
privacy_policies.description: Some tools optionally connect to external services when configured: Figma API (designer_sync_tokens, designer_review_figma), Supabase (voice inbox sync). These require explicit API key configuration and are clearly marked with openWorldHint annotations.

privacy_policies.name: No Telemetry
privacy_policies.description: This MCP server does not collect telemetry, usage analytics, or any form of tracking data.
